item.title: Inspecting file systems and block devices
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: File system information sudo dumpe2fs /dev/<device> Or for size information: sudo dumpe2fs /dev/<device> | grep size Physical blocks of a file sudo PAGER=cat debugfs -R 'stat <file>' /dev/<device> Notes: -<file> must be relative to the file system. --R is used to give a direct command. Omit -R '...' to enter interactive mode. -PAGER=cat ensures that no pager (as less) is used. Check man debugfs for additional commands.
